entry.def: You use himself to refer to a man, boy, or male animal.
entry.tran: 他自己;它自己（指雄性动物）

example.ex: He poured himself a whisky and sat down in the chair...
example.tran: 他给自己倒了一杯威士忌，然后坐在椅子上。

example.ex: A driver blew up his car and himself after being stopped at a police checkpoint...
example.tran: 一名司机在一个警方检查站被拦截后，把自己连人带车炸上了天。

entry.def: In written English, himself is sometimes used to refer to a person without saying whether that person is a man or a woman. Some people dislike this use and prefer to use 'himself or herself' or 'themselves'.
entry.tran: （书面英语中泛指人）他自己，她自己（有些人不喜欢这种用法，更倾向于使用 himself or herself 或 themselves）

example.ex: The child's natural way of expressing himself is play...
example.tran: 孩子表达自己的本能方法就是玩耍。

example.ex: The student is invited to test each item for himself by means of specific techniques.
example.tran: 邀请学生们采用特定的技术自己去测试每个项目。

entry.def: In some religions, Himself is used to refer to God.

example.ex: He thanked God for concealing Himself from the wise and revealing Himself to the simple.
example.tran: 他感谢上帝，因为上帝在自作聪明的人面前自行隐匿，在心地纯洁的人面前则显现神迹。

entry.def: You use himself to emphasize the person or thing that you are referring to. Himself is sometimes used instead of 'him' as the object of a verb or preposition.
entry.tran: （用于加强语气，有时代替 him 充当宾语）他本人，它本身

example.ex: There's no evidence that the Prime Minister himself cancelled the visit.
example.tran: 没有证据表明是首相本人取消了访问。

example.ex: He himself had joined the others straight from the office...
example.tran: 他本人下班后径直加入到了他们的行列。

Sentence.sentence: The British traveler Charles Thompson spoke for many Grand Tourists when in 1744 he described himself as being impatiently desirous of viewing a country so famous in history, a country which once gave laws to the world, and which is at present the greatest school of music and painting, contains the noblest productions of sculpture and architecture, and is filled with cabinets of rarities, and collections of all kinds of historical relics.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Jack White, the former front man of the White Stripes and an influential figure among fellow musicians, likes to make things difficult for himself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He tells the story of a patient, a first-time mother who complained that her young son was always clinging to her, wrapping himself around her legs wherever she went
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Yet neither Barack Obama nor Mitt Romney promotes himself as tool-savvy (使用工具很在行的) presidential timber, in the mold of a Jimmy Carter, a skilled carpenter and cabinet maker.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He felt proud that he was a do-it-yourself himself
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: the man said, and introduced himself as Larry; we had met, I gathered, 19 years before, when he had been living in the hermitage as an assistant to one of the monks.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The author takes walks and reads and loses himself in the stillness of the hermitage so that he can bring his wife and bosses and friends around him anthing valuable
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It taught him how to think independently and abstractly about space and time, and it wasn't long before he became a philosopher himself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: How can a speaker make himself more persuasive when delivering a speech?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He distinguished himself in low temperature physics
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He would detach himself from the routines of life.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He prefers to keep his gardening skills to himself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He considers himself a blessed man
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He also used ski poles in an unorthodox way—to propel himself as he skied.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: However the lead role is a comedian by the name of Frankie, and he plays himself.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: That means when a golfer tells himself "Don't hit the ball into the water", his mind sees the image of the ball flying into the water.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: We often take a militaristic, "tough" approach to resilience and determination like a Marine pulling himself through the mud, a boxer going one more round, or a football player picking himself up off the ground for one more play.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: While the candle is being lit, a principle is recited; then each person present takes a turn to speak about the importance that principle has to himself or herself.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: After he steadied himself, he shook Glenn's mother's hand, and the inspection continued as though nothing had happened.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: As the vegetables started coming in, dad threw himself into cooking.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: But as the 200th anniversary of his birth approaches, it is possible—and important for our own culture—to understand how he made himself a lasting one.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: But it's also that he rewrote the culture of literature and put himself at the center.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: He comforted himself with the thought she had died in the most beautiful part of the country.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: He could be smart and express himself with clay.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 答案 选项

Sentence.sentence: He gave himself a new name to hide his identity when he went to carry out the secret task.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 单项选择 原文

Sentence.sentence: He swore to himself to avoid music, as he hated getting to school extra early.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: How did Nicholas keep himself warm?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 题设

Sentence.sentence: If a basketball star is, for example, trying to gain a high personal point total, he may take a shot himself when it would be better to pass the ball to a teammate, affecting the team's performance.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Imagine a child standing on a diving board four feet high and asking himself the question: Should I jump?
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Then he piled branches on top of himself, like a blanket, to stay as warm as he could.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: This guy has nothing and yet he didn't take the wallet for himself；he thought about others instead it's unbelievable.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: To warm himself, the sailor sat in front of the fire rubbing one bare foot against the other.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Whaley recalls how at the beginning of the year, when called upon to read, chris would excuse himself to go to the bathroom.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When a reader selects delayed reward news, he pulls himself into the world of surrounding reality to which he can adapt himself only by hard work.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: Zac knows the meaning of a purple heart—he earned one himself in a war as a soldier.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

means: （用以加强语气）他亲自，他本人

Sentence.sentence: He taught himself shorthand to get an even better job later as a court stenographer and as a reporter in Parliament.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: "The valuable examples which they furnish of the power of self-help, of patient purpose, resolute working and steadfast integrity, issuing in the formation of truly noble and manly character, exhibit," wrote Smiles, " what it is in the power of each to ac
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: "When I come home from a hard day's work, I often feel tired," Danaher says, adding,"In a world in which I don't have to work, I might feel rather different" - perhaps different enough to throw himself into a hobby or a passion project with the intensity
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: But we are taught instead to "decide", just as our president calls himself "the Decider"?
Sentence.come: 2009年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: But we are taught instead to ‘decide,'just as our president calls himself ‘the Decider.'?
Sentence.come: 2009年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: On the other hand, Tronick himself is concerned that the worries about kids use of screens are born out of an "oppressive ideology that demands that parents should always be interacting" with their children.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: (用以加强语气)他亲自, 他本人

sentences.en: He himself is a teacher.
sentences.cn: 他本人就是教师。</seg>
一周之中除周末外他可以一人住这座房子。
sentences.en: He has the house to himself during the week.

sentences.cn: 他自己设法修了汽车。
sentences.en: He managed to repair the car by himself.

sentences.cn: 他独自一人生活。
sentences.en: He lives all by himself.

sentences.cn: 他需要自己的独立的空间。
sentences.en: He needed space to be himself.

sentences.cn: 他今天上午似乎有点不对劲。
sentences.en: He didn't seem quite himself this morning.

sentences.cn: 你见到经理本人了吗？
sentences.en: Did you see the manager himself?

sentences.cn: 是医生本人这么说的。
sentences.en: The doctor said so himself.

sentences.cn: 彼得应为自己感到羞耻。
sentences.en: Peter ought to be ashamed of himself.

sentences.cn: 他作了自我介绍。
sentences.en: He introduced himself.

sentences.cn: 他本人下班后径直加入到了他们的行列。
sentences.en: He himself had joined the others straight from the office...

sentences.cn: 没有证据表明是首相本人取消了访问。
sentences.en: There's no evidence that the Prime Minister himself cancelled the visit.

sentences.cn: 他感谢上帝，因为上帝在自作聪明的人面前自行隐匿，在心地纯洁的人面前则显现神迹。
sentences.en: He thanked God for concealing Himself from the wise and revealing Himself to the simple.

sentences.cn: 邀请学生们采用特定的技术自己去测试每个项目。
sentences.en: The student is invited to test each item for himself by means of specific techniques.

sentences.cn: 孩子表达自己的本能方法就是玩耍。
sentences.en: The child's natural way of expressing himself is play...

sentences.cn: 一名司机在一个警方检查站被拦截后，把自己连人带车炸上了天。
sentences.en: A driver blew up his car and himself after being stopped at a police checkpoint...

sentences.cn: 他给自己倒了一杯威士忌，然后坐在椅子上。
sentences.en: He poured himself a whisky and sat down in the chair...

sentences.cn: 他承认自己喜欢音乐.
sentences.en: He professed himself fond of music.

sentences.cn: 他人在心不在.
sentences.en: He himself is here, but his thoughts are elsewhere.

sentences.cn: 他发现了一个适合他的职位.
sentences.en: He found the right niche for himself.

sentences.cn: 他从没有像现在这样热衷于这个想法.
sentences.en: Never before had he felt himself so powerfully attracted to the idea.

sentences.cn: 他从事英语教学工作.
sentences.en: He employed himself ( in ) teaching English.

sentences.cn: 迪克自以为是个文学天才.
sentences.en: Dick thinks of himself as a genius in literature.

sentences.cn: 他正在亲自办理这件事.
sentences.en: He is attending to the matter himself.

sentences.cn: 让他从金钱束缚下解放自己.
sentences.en: Let him disenslave himself from the pelf of the world.

sentences.cn: 他把自己描绘成民主斗士.
sentences.en: He portrayed himself as a champion for democracy.

sentences.cn: 汤姆认为自己运气好.
sentences.en: Tom accounts himself ( to be ) lucky.

sentences.cn: 他时常 夸耀 自己的知识.
sentences.en: He often values himself on [ upon ] his knowledge.

sentences.cn: 他在狭窄的小厨房里为自己做饭烧菜.
sentences.en: He cooked for himself in the cramped kitchen.

sentences.cn: 他自己设法修了汽车。
sentences.en: He managed to repair the car by himself.

sentences.cn: 卡特发现他自己在埃及人面前为贝京辩护,而在以色列人面前是为萨达特辩护.
sentences.en: Carter found himself defending Bejin to the Egyptians and Sadat to the Israelis.

sentences.cn: 神父意识到了结束的信号, 他自己也使用过很多次同样的方法.
sentences.en: Father Belcher recognized a termination signal, for he'd used similar ones many times himself.

sentences.cn: 用人道主义来看, 我也只能说他自己宣布自己无罪,虽然这也不能改变他什么.
sentences.en: To do him more than full justice, I can only say that he acquitted himself indifferently.

sentences.cn: 他的行为对他自己害多利少.
sentences.en: His behaviour did more harm than good to himself.

sentences.cn: 他自己受过的教育并不差, 可是跟她一比就简直没门了.
sentences.en: He hadn't had a bad education himself, but he couldn't hold a candle to her.

sentences.cn: 道林的怪念头对旁人来说都是法律, 就他自己可以例外.
sentences.en: Dorian's whims are laws to everybody, except himself.

sentences.cn: 蘑菇煎蛋卷正在用筷子吃他自己.
sentences.en: The mushroom omelet was eating himself with chopsticks.

sentences.cn: 他被解雇了,这只能怪他自己.
sentences.en: He has only himself to thank that he has lost his job.

sentences.cn: 她就想作她自己,也喜欢她的男人作他自己.
sentences.en: She likes to be herself and like her guy to be himself.

sentences.cn: 他自己也正想这么说呢.
sentences.en: He has almost phrased it himself.

sentences.cn: Draco谁也不信任, 全靠他自己.
sentences.en: Draco trusts no one, least of all himself.

sentences.cn: 这些麻烦都是他自己找的.
sentences.en: He has brought all that trouble on himself.

sentences.cn: 我们永远不可能完全知道上帝的样式, 但是他自己却向我们显现.
sentences.en: We will never fully comprehend what God is like. Yet He Himself is accessible to us.

sentences.cn: 赫斯渥和售票员一起干活, 把石头一块一块地搬走.他自己也干得发热了.
sentences.en: Hurstwood worked with the conductor, lifting stone after stone and warming himself by the work.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 他常常想到那只脚印. 也许是他自己踩下的 吧 !
sentences.en: He often thought about the foot mark. Perhaps he had made it himself?

sentences.cn: 就像他自己所说的那样, “ 活着应该比死了更艰难吧 ”.
sentences.en: As he himself said, " To Live should be more difficult than it is dead. "

sentences.cn: 要是在从前某一个时期,他自己也会把它们列为互不相关的事项.
sentences.en: At one time he himself would have tabulated them as separate areas of concern.

sentences.cn: 杰克心烦意乱,责怪他自己.
sentences.en: Jack is upset and blames himself.

sentences.cn: 安迪·考夫曼,1949-1984,从不考虑他自己是一个喜剧演员.
sentences.en: Andy Kaufman never considered himself a comedian.

sentences.cn: 我从鲍伯听到它他自己, 因此,它是来自马的嘴的直线.
sentences.en: I heard it from Bob himself, so it's straight from the horse's mouth.

sentences.cn: 他自己也养了两条狗, 泰克特和当.
sentences.en: He himself kept two dogs, Hector and Dan.

sentences.cn: 我不想要他来的, 他自己请他自己来的!
sentences.en: I didn't want him to come. He invited himself.

sentences.cn: 帕格发现他自己正在冷眼观察他的妻子, 就象在判断职业上的事物似的.
sentences.en: Pug found himself looking at his wife detachedly, as he judged professional matters.

sentences.cn: 小布什完全信任他,并且知道切尼的权力其实是他自己赋予的.
sentences.en: Bush trusts him completely and knows Cheney's power is something he himself created.

sentences.cn: 他自己对它完全以心理分析方法分析出来.
sentences.en: He psyched it all out by himself.

sentences.cn: 在那小院子里,离她有两步远的地方, 那人正在洗着他自己, 一点儿也不知道有外人来了.
sentences.en: In the little yard two paces Beyond her, the man was washing himself, utterly unaware.
sentences.from: 英汉 - 翻译样例 - 文学

sentences.cn: 他允许他自己一天抽三支雪茄.
sentences.en: He permitted himself three cigars a day.

sentences.cn: 这个男孩说展览会上的那架飞机模型是他自己组装的.
sentences.en: The boy said the model aeroplane at the exhibition was put together by himself.

sentences.cn: 一个人要发现真理, 只要在他自己里面找即可.
sentences.en: To discover truth, one need only look within himself.

sentences.cn: 第二天早晨,他亲自把那封信送到滨海蒙特勒伊邮局.
sentences.en: The next morning be posted it himself at the office of M. sur M.

sentences.cn: 他亲自负责给我们制定学习计划.
sentences.en: He took upon himself the task of working out a study plan for us.

sentences.cn: 他首度受到这一指控是在两年前,指控人是他亲自任命的检控官.
sentences.en: He was first accused of this around two ago by prosecutors he had chosen himself.

sentences.cn: 他亲自跑回家一趟取所缺的东西.
sentences.en: He himself made an errand home to fetch such things as he lacked.

sentences.cn: 他亲自负起教育他们的责任.
sentences.en: He took upon himself the responsibility of their education.

sentences.cn: 他亲自料理重要的生意.
sentences.en: He attends to the transaction of important business himself.

sentences.cn: 他亲自动手修理他的自行车.
sentences.en: He repaired his bike himself.

sentences.cn: 他亲自审计那项帐目.
sentences.en: He audit the account by himself.

sentences.cn: 他本人下班后径直加入到了他们的行列。
sentences.en: He himself had joined the others straight from the office...

sentences.cn: 他本人已变成一个严肃的老家伙.
sentences.en: He himself had changed into a grim old dog.

sentences.cn: 如此, 随著他本人越来越趋近解脱, 转而成为他人的灯塔.
sentences.en: Thus, while drawing ever closer to deliverance himself, he becomes in turn beacon light for others.

sentences.cn: 但他本人更为准确的叙述了他的道路是“摸着石头过河”.
sentences.en: He himself more accurately described his approach as crossing a river by feeling the stones.

sentences.cn: 他本人著作甚丰, 又参予起草过许多重要文献.
sentences.en: He himself composing very abundant , participation has drafted a lot of important document.

sentences.cn: 这里的人以他本人也会喜欢的方式来庆祝他的生日.
sentences.en: Here his birthday is celebrated as he himself would have liked it.

sentences.cn: 狂轰乱炸虽然毁掉了他在突尼斯的旧总部,他本人却仍然毫发无伤.
sentences.en: The wild bombing destroyed his old headquarters in Tunis but Arafat himself was unhurt.

sentences.cn: 他本人就是个热心肠的人,乐意唤起他人的热情.
sentences.en: He was an enthusiast himself and loved to evoke enthusiasm in others.

sentences.cn: 那位市政厅议员声明,他本人与关闭镇上最大的百货公司的决定无关.
sentences.en: The council dissociated himself from the decision to close the biggest department store in the town.

sentences.cn: 壁炉架上有一张他本人的照片.
sentences.en: There was a photograph of himself on the chimney piece.

sentences.cn: 我们研究他的思想,就是对他本人最好的纪念.
sentences.en: That we study his thoughts is the best commemoration of himself.

sentences.cn: 他本人就是教师.
sentences.en: He himself is a teacher.

sentences.cn: 我比他本人可以做得更好一些.
sentences.en: I can do it better than himself.

sentences.cn: 他讲起那个城市来就好像他本人去过哪儿似的.
sentences.en: He talks about that city as if ( though ) he had been there himself.

sentences.cn: 他本人深信克莱德确实非常残暴地弄死了那个姑娘.
sentences.en: He himself was convinced that Clyde had murdered the girl in cold blood.

sentences.cn: 他本人显得很激动,并下定决定要尽快替他父亲报仇.
sentences.en: He himself became excited and firmly decided to revenge his father as soon as he could.

sentences.cn: 他本人就是一位大夫.
sentences.en: Himself is a doctor.

sentences.cn: 他以为自己聋了,因为不再听说有关他本人的新闻.
sentences.en: He thinks he is deaf because he no longer hears himself talked about.

sentences.cn: 他本人坚持白天将温度设在22℃,夜间设在19℃.
sentences.en: He himself insists on a temperature setting of 22 ℃ by day 19 ℃ at night.

sentences.cn: 不管他本人来还是派代理人来,那都无关紧要.
sentences.en: It is immaterial whether he comes himself or sends a substitute.

sentences.cn: 他本人就是一个排球爱好者.
sentences.en: He himself is fanatic of volleyball.

sentences.cn: 他本人是个弊脚的指挥官, 会吹牛皮,又粗鲁残暴.
sentences.en: He himself was a bad commander, a boaster and ruffian.

sentences.cn: 他本人在舒兹伯利建了一座修道院,晚年就在那里做了修道士.
sentences.en: He founded a monastery in Shrewsburg himself and took the habit there in old age.

sentences.cn: 肖邦写的几乎全是钢琴曲,而且他本人就是一名出色的钢琴演奏家.
sentences.en: Chopin wrote almost entirely for the PIANO and was an excellent pianist himself.

sentences.cn: 哈密尔顿先生和他本人之间的意见冲突令人不快.
sentences.en: The opposition of views between Mr. Hamilton and himself was unpleasant.

sentences.cn: 他本人显得很激动,并下定决心要尽快替他父亲报仇.
sentences.en: He himself became excited and firmly decided to avenge his father as soon as he could.

sentences.cn: 他这次所谈的意见实质上同他本人早先提出的方案并无多大的差别.
sentences.en: There were very similar to those he himself had advanced earlier.

sentences.cn: 他本人即是一盏明灯 、 一个路标.
sentences.en: He himself is a bright lamp, a route marking.

sentences.cn: 他对于劳工阶级具有很大影响, 因为他本人曾是个技工.
sentences.en: He has great influence with the working classes, because he himself was once a mechanic.

sentences.cn: 我立即意识到, 他本人就是英国人.
sentences.en: As I soon learnt, he was English himself.

Sentence.sentence: Within the wider business world, a man who liked to see himself as a hippy （嬉皮士）, permanently in revolt against big companies, ended up being hailed by many of those corporate giants as one of the greatest chief executives of his time.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: What should one do if he doesn't wish to fool himself?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The man had better talk with the students himself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He will continue to work in the garden himself
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The man found himself in a wrong place.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He seldom tells the truth about himself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The man should buy himself a new suit.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He really should shave himself every other day at least and put on something clean.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Later, in his cook books, he would often include a sketch of himself, so that people on the street would be able to recognize—and admire—him.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The next day Houde came out to see the fossil for himself.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: When the weather cleared, Naddodd found himself on the coast of a new land.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C
